title: Breaded Garlic Chicken Escalopes
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons garlic granules or to taste', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon paprika', '60g seasoned breadcrumbs', '125g plain flour', '125ml milk', '1 egg', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, pounded thin', '250ml oil for frying or as needed']
